title: update to from 5.0.12 to 5.0.13 is breaking my osx 10.9 (mavericks) calendar
body:
hi!

after updating my owncloud installation (on debian wheezy) from 5.0.12 to 5.0.13 the ical application from osx 10.9 (mavericks) comes with a http 404  message for the url "report /remote.php/caldav/principals/user%40domain.com/". the calendars are working but the message is annoying.

my ios clients don't use that url. they use "options /remote.php/carddav/principals/user%40domain.com/" and get a http 200 return code.

after starting ical i get this log entrys:

```
217.248.76.123 - - [11/nov/2013:09:35:48 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/principals/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 401 6479 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:48 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/principals/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 207 2571 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "options /remote.php/caldav/principals/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 200 1140 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - - [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "report /remote.php/caldav/principals/ http/1.1" 401 954 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "report /remote.php/caldav/principals/ http/1.1" 200 1467 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - - [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 401 954 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 207 21695 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "proppatch /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 207 1130 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:49 +0100] "proppatch /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 207 1130 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:50 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/principals/user2%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 207 1482 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:50 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/35ae821d-e773-492f-a632-4431ed81d45b/ http/1.1" 207 1274 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:50 +0100] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/35ae821d-e773-492f-a632-4431ed81d45b/ http/1.1" 207 38195 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:50 +0100] "report /remote.php/caldav/calendars/user%40domain.com/35ae821d-e773-492f-a632-4431ed81d45b/ http/1.1" 207 11545 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
217.248.76.123 - user@domain.com [11/nov/2013:09:35:50 +0100] "report /remote.php/caldav/principals/user%40domain.com/ http/1.1" 404 1002 "-" "mac_os_x/10.9 (13a603) calendaragent/174"
```

do you need more information?

regards
ralph
